landing.not_logged_in: You are not logged in. Please log in to continue:

errors.user_not_authz: Hold on. Your user is not authorized!.
errors.user_not_set: Hold on. Can not get any valid user.
errors.server_error: There was a problem with our server, please contact admin.
errors.not_allowed: You are not allowed here, please login with another user to access this page.

step_two.have_account: Do you have an FNid account?
step_two.sign_in_account: to autopopulate this info and manage this order.
step_two.asterisks_bold: NOTE: Ticket(s) can be assigned later.
step_two.asterisks: Ticket holders will immediately receive an email to finalize their attendee information.
step_two.add_ticket: Add additional ticket(s) to this order

stripe_errors.cardNumber: Please enter a valid Credit Card.

step_four.subtitle: Your Order is Now Complete
step_four.member_exclamation: You are signed in with your FNid and will use it to log in to the event on show days.
step_four.member_text: You may proceed directly to the "
step_four.member_text_1: " page to review your ticket(s) and complete any required details. Visit the "
step_four.member_text_2: " page to manage your purchase, assign ticket(s), and edit attendee details.
step_four.required_text: PLEASE NOTE! Ticket(s) must be assigned and all additional details must be completed before official ticket(s) are issued.
step_four.register_text: An FNid is required to manage order(s) and assign ticket(s)
step_four.register_text_3: used for this purchase, you will then be able to manage your order.
step_four.register_email_bold: You will now receive an email with a one-click link to create a password for your FNid.
step_four.register_email_1: Your FNid will allow you to access the event.  Visit the "
step_four.register_email_2: " page to manage your purchase, assign ticket(s), and edit attendee details.

guests.invalid_thanks: Thanks for coming to fill in the remaining details so we can issue your ticket.
guests.invalid_text_1: Unfortunately the link in your email has expired. Not to worry we will send you a fresh link. Click here or the button below to get a new link.
guests.invalid_contact: If you have any problems please email
guests.hash_regenerated: Please check your new link in your email
guests.completed_text_1: Thank you for completing your additional details. Your ticket has now been issued. Please use your FNid to access the event.
guests.completed_text_2: You will also receive an email confirmation.
